name: 陳孝行
objective: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對物化處理程序之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括化學反應動力學、高等氧化還原程序、薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序等之應用。
schedule:
Week　　Contents
1　　Introduction 
2-3　　Membrane Filtration 
4-5　　Reverse Osmosis
6　　Reactor analysis
7　　Midterm #1
8　　Reactor analysis
9-10　　Separation Processes and Mass Transfer
11-12　　Chemical Oxidation and Reduction 
13　　Midterm #2
14-15　　Adsorption
16-17　　Disinfection Byproducts
18　　Final Examination
scorePolicy:
Mid term twice　　         30 %
Homework　　                  10 %
PowerPoint presentation　　30 %
Final examination　　         30 %
materials:
Textbook： 
Water treatment principles and design by MWH, J. M. John Wiley and Sons, New York, 2005.

(1)Chemistry for Environmental Engineering, by C.N. Sawyer, P. L. McCarty, and G. F. Parkin, McGraw-Hill, Fifth Edition, 2002.
